entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:01 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then rain. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
